text.section: In this Part I of this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Attorney trust account" means an account that a lawyer or law firm maintains at a financial institution for the deposit of trust money.
"Attorney trust account" includes an escrow account.

text.section: "Beneficial owner" means a person, other than the client of a lawyer, for whose benefit a lawyer is entrusted to hold trust money.
"Trust money" means a deposit, payment, or other money that a person entrusts to a lawyer to hold for the benefit of a client or a beneficial owner.
